title: Immediate Impact Players,  Cam Heyward, Top 5 RBs under 25, AFC West Preview, and All Time Underrated WRs
itunes:title: Immediate Impact Players,  Cam Heyward, Top 5 RBs under 25, AFC West Preview, and All Time Underrated WRs
description:
The 'Best of' Edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with players from the 2022 Draft that will have an immediate impact.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, Mike Garafolo, Tom Pelissero and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara explore their favorite Draft picks and moments that stood out. Steelers DT Cam Heyward stops by to discuss his brother Connor in the Draft and Pittsburgh's QB Kenny Pickett. Peter lists his Top 5 RBs under 25 before we head to our preview of the AFC West.  Tom lists his All Time underrated WR list with Kyle submitting one more player for consideration.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
